Kandy,
while reading your post, I saw your screen name, or part of it anyway, and
then the little address at the bottom concerning working at home. I would be
interested in knowing if you have actually done the team concept thing and
how it works. If you want to email me privately so as not to tie up the
posts on this loop, you can do so at HSMOTGO@...
Thanks, Teresa

messages.subject: a question for Kandy : )
messages.msgSnippet: Kandy, while reading your post, I saw your screen name, or part of it anyway, and then the little address at the bottom concerning working at home.  I would be
messages.messageBody:
Kandy,
while reading your post, I saw your screen name, or part of it anyway, and
then the little address at the bottom concerning working at home.  I would be
interested in knowing if you have actually done the team concept thing and
how it works.  If you want to email me privately so as not to tie up the
posts on this loop, you can do so at HSMOTGO@...
Thanks, Teresa
